sentences: Daniel and Martin also co-wrote the track "Someone to Call Me Darling" on Lorrie Morgan's 1992 album Watch Me, which also featured Daniel on background vocals.
Daniel made her first recording at age 14, and by 1991, she had joined Moe Bandy's band.
Signed to BNA Records (then known as BNA Entertainment) in 1993, she released her Jerry Crutchfield-produced debut album Luck of Our Own in March 1994.
She has not recorded since, although her debut album's title track was covered on Keith Urban's 1999 self-titled album.
